name: Oh My Chicken
description:
You live lovely chickens. They depend all on you. Feed them, Love them from bottom of you heart, even if so noisy.

Developed for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

[Credits]

Sound Effects - Fesliyan Studios https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
